title: DataDictionary
description: A data dictionary with human and machine readable information for a tabular data file

Identifier.title: Identifier
Identifier.description: An identifier of a controlled term with an IRI

TermURL.title: Termurl
TermURL.description: An unambiguous identifier for the term, concept or entity that is referenced

Label.title: Label
Label.description: A human readable label. If more than one label exists for the term, then the preferred label should be used.

CategoricalNeurobagel.title: CategoricalNeurobagel
CategoricalNeurobagel.description: A Neurobagel annotation for a categorical column

IsAbout.title: Isabout
IsAbout.description: The concept or controlled term that describes this column

MissingValues.title: Missingvalues
MissingValues.description: A list of unique values that represent invalid responses, typos, or missing data

IsPartOf.title: Ispartof
IsPartOf.description: If the column is a subscale or item of an assessment tool then the assessment tool should be specified here.

Levels.title: Levels
Levels.description: For categorical variables: An object of values (keys) in the column and the semanticterm (URI and label) they are unambiguously mapped to.

ContinuousNeurobagel.title: ContinuousNeurobagel
ContinuousNeurobagel.description: A Neurobagel annotation for a continuous column

IsAbout.title: Isabout
IsAbout.description: The concept or controlled term that describes this column

MissingValues.title: Missingvalues
MissingValues.description: A list of unique values that represent invalid responses, typos, or missing data

IsPartOf.title: Ispartof
IsPartOf.description: If the column is a subscale or item of an assessment tool then the assessment tool should be specified here.

Transformation.title: Transformation
Transformation.description: For continuous columns this field can be used to describea transformation that can be applied to the values in thiscolumn in order to match the desired format of a standardizeddata element referenced in the IsAbout attribute.

ContinuousColumn.title: ContinuousColumn
ContinuousColumn.description: A BIDS column annotation for a continuous column

Units.title: Units
Units.description: Measurement units for the values in this column. SI units in CMIXF formatting are RECOMMENDED (see Units)

CategoricalColumn.title: CategoricalColumn
CategoricalColumn.description: A BIDS column annotation for a categorical column

Levels.title: Levels
Levels.description: For categorical variables: An object of possible values (keys) and their descriptions (values).
